eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.util

Class ItemUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.util.ItemUtils

  • public class ItemUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    An util class for reading and writing item stack properties.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    EquipmentUtils

        itemStack - The item stack to check.
        Returns:
        If the item is not air.

                                 org.bukkit.Material material)
        Checks if the item stack is not null and made out of a given material.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • fitsInInventory

        public static boolean fitsInInventory(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory,
                                      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
        Checks if enough space is left in an inventory, to fit in the given item stack. This is done by checking, if a free slot is available. If not, it is checked, if the items can be stacked with an already existing item stack.
        Parameters:
        inventory - The inventory to iterate through.
        itemStack - The item stack to check for.
        Returns:
        If the item stack fits inside the inventory.
        See Also:
        countSpecificStackableItems(Inventory, ItemStack), getAmountOfStacks(int, int)

      • getAmountOfStacks

        private static int getAmountOfStacks(int maxStackSize,
                                     int itemAmount)
        Counts how many stacks are needed to fit the given amount of items.
        Parameters:
        maxStackSize - The maximum stack size of that item.
        itemAmount - The amount of items.
        Returns:
        How man stacks are needed to fit the items.

      • countSpecificStackableItems

        public static int countSpecificStackableItems(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory,
                                              org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
        Counts the total amount of the given item stack inside an inventory.
        Parameters:
        inventory - The inventory to iterate through.
        itemStack - The item stack to check for.
        Returns:
        The amount of times, the item was found inside the inventory.
        See Also:
        isSpecificItem(ItemStack, String)

      • doesLoreContain

        public static boolean doesLoreContain(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack,
                                      java.lang.String content)
        Checks if the lore of the item stack contains the given string. Does NOT include null check.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item stack to check.
        content - The string to check for.
        Returns:
        If the string was found.

      • getStringFromLore

        public static java.lang.String getStringFromLore(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack,
                                                 java.lang.String content,
                                                 int index)
        Gets a string from an item stack's lore, based on line content and word index. Does NOT include null check.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item stack to check.
        content - The string to identify the line with.
        index - The word index inside the found line.
        Returns:
        The string on the found line, with the given word index.

      • getStringBetweenFromLore

        public static java.lang.String getStringBetweenFromLore(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack,
                                                        java.lang.String before,
                                                        java.lang.String after)
        Finds a string between two other strings somewhere inside an item's lore. Does NOT include null check.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item stack to check.
        before - The string before the wanted string.
        after - The string after the wanted string.
        Returns:
        The string between the other strings.

      • getIntegerFromLore

        public static int getIntegerFromLore(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack,
                                     java.lang.String content,
                                     int index)
        Gets an integer from an item stack's lore, based on line content and word index. Does NOT include null check.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item stack to check.
        content - The string to identify the line with.
        index - The word index inside the found line.
        Returns:
        The int on the found line, with the given word index.

      • getIntegerSumBetweenFromLore

        public static int getIntegerSumBetweenFromLore(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack,
                                               java.lang.String before,
                                               java.lang.String after)
        Finds the sum of all integers between all occurances of two strings somewhere inside an item's lore. Does NOT include null check.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item stack to check.
        before - The string before the wanted int.
        after - The string after the wanted int.
        Returns:
        The sum of all integers between occurances of the two strings.

      • replaceStringFromLore

        public static boolean replaceStringFromLore(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack,
                                            java.lang.String content,
                                            java.lang.String replacement)
        Replaces all occurances of a line inside an item stack's lore. Does NOT include null check.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item stack to edit.
        content - The string to identify the line with.
        replacement - The replacement of the content.
        Returns:
        If at least one occurance was replaced.

      • replaceStringFromLore

        public static boolean replaceStringFromLore(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack,
                                            java.lang.String content,
                                            int index,
                                            java.lang.String replacement)
        Replaces a substring with given word index in all occurances of a string inside an item's lore. Does NOT include null check.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item stack to edit.
        content - The string to identify the line with.
        index - The word index of the substring to replace inside the found line.
        replacement - The replacement of the content.
        Returns:
        If at least one occurance was replaced.
